Text:
The mp3 discography (includes some songs not in this torrent) can be downloaded here http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5862894/

Note that the reflection mp3 is damaged and it is missing the lustmurd parabola remix.
Amazing upload ! Thank you very much ! saved me tones of time!
You are a god.  Long live Tool!
Guys don't believe what the uploader wrote, these are no 'hdcd' rips and a lot of the songs have a ton of distortion, even on 10,000 days.. like crappy limewire tracks..
